speakers.name: Jane Smith
speakers.title: Senior Software Engineer
speakers.bio: Jane is a Senior Software Engineer at Google with over 8 years of experience in AI/ML and cloud technologies. She leads the development of machine learning infrastructure and has contributed to several open-source projects.
speakers.session: The Future of AI in Web Development

speakers.name: Michael Davis
speakers.title: Lead Mobile Developer
speakers.bio: Michael has been working with Flutter since its early days and has built mobile apps used by millions. He's passionate about cross-platform development and developer experience.

speakers.name: Sarah O'Connor
speakers.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
speakers.bio: Sarah helps enterprises migrate to and scale on Google Cloud Platform. She specializes in containerization, microservices, and DevOps practices.
speakers.session: Scaling Applications with Google Cloud Run

speakers.name: David Wilson
speakers.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
speakers.bio: David is a frontend engineering leader with expertise in modern web frameworks, performance optimization, and developer tooling.

speakers.name: Emma Thompson
speakers.title: DevOps Engineer
speakers.bio: Emma specializes in building robust CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation. She's passionate about developer productivity and security.

speakers.name: James Murphy
speakers.title: Data Scientist
speakers.bio: James works on cutting-edge AI research at DeepMind, focusing on reinforcement learning and neural networks for real-world applications.
